data.prayer: Father, convict the 2,788 believers in Nord to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord, New Caledonia

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Nord, New Caledonia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nord, New Caledonia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, we ask for 9 new simple churches in the state of Nord, New Caledonia. Place a simple church in every community of the 45,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Nord, New Caledonia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Canala
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Canala, Nord, New Caledonia.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Nord to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Nord.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nord, New Caledonia has a population of 45,100.

We estimate Nord has 2,788 people who might know Jesus, 32,590 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,722 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Nord, New Caledonia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
